original_title: Dancing Outlaw II: Jesco Goes to Hollywood
overview: As the popularity of the Dancing Outlaw grew after the release of his biographical documentary, Jesco White was asked by comedian Tom Arnold to perform on the television show Roseanne. He traveled to Los Angeles for the performance, which was chronicled in the 1994 short film Dancing Outlaw 2: Jesco Goes To Hollywood - directed by Jacob Young.
title: Dancing Outlaw II: Jesco Goes to Hollywood
